title: Sales Representative – Fluent in English
job_overview:
We're Hiring: Elite Remote Sales Representatives (Fluent/Native English Speakers Only)
We’re assembling a high-performance international sales team for a fast-growing global project, and we’re only looking for the best of the best.

If you’re a fluent/native English speaker with a confident voice, persuasive style, and a passion for closing deals, this is for you.

The Role
As part of our elite sales team, you'll:

- Call warm leads, people who’ve already shown interest

- Present product options, handle objections, and close the sale

- Deliver top-notch support via email, chat, and phone

- Identify opportunities for upgrades and upsells

 Compensation & Perks

- $4/hour base rate

- Generous performance bonuses ????

- Payout via Wise or PayPal

- Rapid promotion path for high performers

- Work from anywhere – fully remote

What We’re Looking For:

- Native/Fluent English speaker – with zero accent

- At least 1 year of sales or phone closing experience

- Strong communication, empathy, and persuasion skills

- Fast, reliable internet & a quiet home workspace

- Hungry to succeed, reliable, and results-driven

 How to Apply
Send us:

- Your CV / Resume

- A short note describing your sales experience

- A voice recording introducing yourself 

We’re hiring immediately, only top-tier closers will make the cut.
